teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Maria Shriver + A Woman's Nation
teams.loan_because: For as little as $25, we can help women entrepreneurs right in our own backyard.
teams.description:
Continuing what she began as First Lady of California, Maria Shriver and A Woman’s Nation are partnering with Kiva, the world's first person-to-person microlending website, to empower thousands of women across America to become more financially independent. Our partnership shows that every loan you make to a woman entrepreneur – even $25 – will make a real difference. 

As "The Shriver Report: A Woman’s Nation Pushes Back from the Brink"* states, 1 in 3 American women lives on or near the brink of poverty. By starting or expanding her own business, a woman can lift herself and her family off the brink. JOIN US in moving women and families forward!

A Woman’s Nation™ is a nonprofit organization founded by Maria Shriver that imagines a new way forward for women and men, girls and boys. Through its multimedia initiatives and innovative partnerships, A Woman's Nation informs, inspires, and implements bold ideas into action with the goal of creating a culture where all lives and all work are respected, recognized, and valued. To learn more please visit AWomansNation.org.
 
* A project of A Woman's Nation, produced in partnership with Center for American Progress.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.loan_because: We have a passion for seeing other people succeed and helping them to achieve total freedom and success in business.
teams.description: We are a group of entrepreneurs, business owners, and leaders who take action to change our life and the life of others.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: Lampwork  Etc
teams.loan_because: We embrace a universal belief that everyone can make a difference.
teams.description: We are a community of glass artists, and glass art supporters. We are brought together by a common love of glass art. We strive to support those with an entrepreneurial spirit.

teams.name: Small Planet
teams.loan_because: We can and we care.
teams.description: We are here to share opportunity.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Donald Trump corp. and family
teams.loan_because: We strive to help the poor in third world country. Think big and kiss ass (alleviate poverty in the world)!
teams.description: We can give away 30 cars in 30 days, there is nothing we can't do!

teams.name: Kiva Team Captains
teams.loan_because: We want to bring people together to raise awareness about Kiva in our communities.
teams.description: This group is about empowering Team Captains to become Community Marketers.  It is our goal to provide Kiva's biggest advocates with more tools to spread the word about Kiva.

teams.name: Colorado State University Alumni
teams.loan_because: This is a world filled with Rams who want a better situation for less advantaged people.
teams.description: We are alumni of Colorado State University who feel that together we can make a difference globally. CSU has given us a boost up in our own lives and now it's time for us to further that gift to the rest of the world.

teams.name: Colorado State University
teams.loan_because: We are CSU Rams who want to see the end of poverty.
teams.description: At Colorado State University we are privileged to have a fantastic education which allows us to realize our individual goals. We want to further this experience by helping others around the world to reach their own goals.

teams.name: British Columbia, Canada
teams.description: Kiva lenders from Beautiful British Columbia, Canada.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Kiva Team Captains
teams.loan_because: We want to bring people together to raise awareness about Kiva in our communities.
teams.description: This group is about empowering Team Captains to become Community Marketers.  It is our goal to provide Kiva's biggest advocates with more tools to spread the word about Kiva.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Armenia
teams.loan_because: we want to be part of a global community that aims to sustainably alleviate poverty
teams.description:
The Armenia Team currently has 90 members supporting Armenian entrepreneurs. 

Whether they make cheese, herd sheep, sell shoes, or grow tomatoes, our team exists to support them in getting access to affordable loans all over Armenia.
 
Past and Present Kiva Fellows Serving in Armenia:

- Velizara Passajova KF8
- Brian Kelly KF9
- Suzanne Till KF9
- Alexis Ohanian KF10
- Liz Nagle KF10
- Peter Tashjian KF11
- Vanick Der Bedrossian KF12
- Abhishek Banerjee KF13
- Caree Edson KF14

As Kiva Fellows, we are here to support Kiva lending in Armenia. We will update team members with interesting news, and gladly answer any questions you may have.

Happy lending, and Go Team Armenia!

You can check out our field partners:
SEF International here: http://www.kiva.org/partners/169
and Nor Horizon here:
http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=146&_tpg=fb

teams.name: Pittsburgh
teams.loan_because: Pittsburghers understand hard work. We support the idea of opportunity for all people.
teams.description:
The Kiva Pittsburgh team is made up of progressive Pittsburgh natives, transplants and others who love the city. We look forward to hosting events for current Kiva loaners and those interested in Kiva.

We come together to make a change in our world.

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/KivaPittsburgh

Check us out on Facebook:
www.facebook.com/KivaPittsburgh

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Friends of Kevin Olin
teams.loan_because: in the words of Kevin, "it's a justice issue, not charity.  Everyone deserves a chance to support themselves and their family. Micro-loans provide this opportunity."
teams.description: We lost a very important, influential person in our lives who was passionate about the power of Kiva and we want to continue his generosity.

teams.name: Boston University
teams.description: If you are a student, faculty, alumni, or otherwise affiliated with Boston University, please join!

teams.name: Team Japan
teams.loan_because: we feel that we can help the world, one person at a time.
teams.description:
There are many Kiva lenders who live in Japan, and we hope to be able to make a difference, not only as individuals, but now as a team. Please feel free to join us....not only from anywhere in Japan, but anywhere in the world. All you need is an interest in Japan. 

一緒に貧困をなくしましょう．．．お待ちしています！

(Picture: Mt. Fuji and the full moon at sunrise New Year's Day 2010 写真：朝日の富士山と満月２０１０年元日）

teams.name: Sheri's Perpetual Acceleration Machine
teams.loan_because: We care. We are trying to accelerate ourselves and therefore in turn accelerate others.
teams.description:
Sheri's Perpetual Acceleration Machine [SPAM] was formed to edify its members 
by sharing helpful links and other information of interest. Perpetual 
acceleration = constantly improving. SPAM doesn't deserve such a bad rap, 
after all. (Besides, it's MAPS backwards. MAPS to success! Oh yeah!)

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster

teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

and

teams.name: New México USA
teams.loan_because:
New Mexicans have always been generous people, no matter what their background. We are always ready to help our vecinos (neighbors) even if they do not live in our country.  
          

Los Nuevos Mexicanos han sido siempre gente generoso, no importa quién son. Estamos siempre listos para ayudar a nuestro neighbors (vecinos) incluso si no viven en nuestro país.
teams.description:
We are New México!

¡Somos Nuevo México!

teams.name: Kiva Baha'is
teams.loan_because: Baha'u'llah told us to "Be generous in prosperity, and thankful in adversity. Be worthy of the trust of thy neighbor, and look upon him with a bright and friendly face. Be a treasure to the poor, an admonisher to the rich, an answerer to the cry of the needy, a preserver of the sanctity of thy pledge."

teams.name: Bloggers
teams.loan_because:
bloggers and their readers are generous people too. You don't have to run a blog to join the group. If you do run a blog, invite your readers/fans to join the group!

Just like blogs, our  money and support have no boundaries either.
teams.description: This group was created to bring together all types of Bloggers and their readers&fans who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: University of South Florida
teams.loan_because: USF is one of 39 U.S. public colleges and universities (the only one in Florida) classified by the Carnegie Foundation as "Community Engaged."  Our commitment to a better world for all remains a strong passion for USF students, faculty, alumni and friends.
teams.description: The University of South Florida is one of the nation's top 63 public research universities.The University has a $1.6 billion annual budget, an annual economic impact of $3.2 billion, and serves more than 45,000 students on campuses in Tampa, St. Petersburg, Sarasota-Manatee and USF Polytechnic. USF is one of only three Florida public universities classified by the Carnegie Foundation for the Advancement of Teaching in the top tier of research activities, a distinction attained by only 2.2 percent of all universities. USF offers 232 degree programs at the undergraduate, graduate, specialist and doctoral levels, including 89 bachelor, 97 master, two ed specialist, 36 research doctoral, and four professional doctoral programs. USF is a member of the Big East Athletic Conference. GO BULLS!!!

teams.name: Retired Greyhounds
teams.loan_because: we care
teams.description: Friends of retired greyhounds, the 45 mile per hour couch potato!

teams.name: League of Majestic Magicians
teams.loan_because: We deeply care about the welfare of human-kind and the connection between us all.
teams.description: Passionate people who believe: That a penny in our pockets might be overlooked, BUT in the hands of someone who needs it, is a copper gem to behold!

teams.name: Texas
teams.loan_because: Texas does it bigger!

teams.name: Team Toronto
teams.loan_because: The people who are lucky enough to live in Toronto care about creating a self sustaining legacy in all parts of civilization, and wish that economic conditions in more of the world could be like they are here.
teams.description: This team began with one person, but soon gained strength and momentum through the generosity of the people of Toronto, Canada and their friends. Now this team has over 300 members, has loaned hundreds of thousands of dollars over the past six years and is helping people all over the world. Join us today!!

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.
